source: PMC Academic Study on 2005 Cholera in Senegal
processing_notes: Source states: 'Mauritania, Guinea, Mali and Gambia with 4132, 3821, 1178, and 214 cholera cases, respectively' - interpreted as 214 suspected cholera cases for Gambia during 2005 regional epidemic

Source states: '1869 Bathurst cholera epidemic - 1,700 deaths from 5,000 population' - interpreted as 1700 cholera deaths with 34% mortality rate during devastating historical epidemic in colonial Bathurst (modern Banjul)
